``` ::: ::: ## Common errors :::{.columns} :::{.column} ![](https://cdn.pixabay.com/photo/2013/07/13/10/42/traffic-157617_1280.png) ::: :::{.column .incremental} - "I have so many data and what to see what comes out of it" - "I still don't have a clear hypothesis or prediction but I started collecting my data" - "My research doesn't need a hypothesis" ::: ::: ## Workflow [(from wikipedia)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hypothetico-deductive_model) :::{.incremental} - 1- Based on observation, previous collected data and literature, find a knowledge gap - 2- Form a hypothesis that explains the phenomenon - 3- Deduce some expected patterns, assuming your hypotheses is **true** - 4- Design a experiment to test your hypothesis ::: ## ![](https://www.researchgate.net/profile/Gordana-Dodig-Crnkovic/publication/237257709/figure/fig2/AS:669504807915522@1536633793084/Diagram-describing-iterative-nature-of-the-hypothetico-deductive-method.png) source: [Crnkovic and Crnkovic 2014](https://www.researchgate.net/publication/237257709_Computing_Curricula_Teaching_Theory_of_Science_to_Computer_Science_Students_Science_Education_Curriculum_Research_and_Development) ## ![](img/bats_abs.png) ## Knowledge vs Data :::{.columns} :::{.column} ![](img/finch1.png) ::: :::{.column} ![](img/finch2.png) ::: ::: source: [Kalinowski & Pelakh 2023](https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/full/10.1002/tea.21892) ## How science advances? ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6609e5640a3868d8df142f19/660b2a9b7ce2e664f7152a33_kuhn-cycle.001.png) ## Are you doing science right?

<script>
  // htmlwidgets need to know to resize themselves when slides are shown/hidden.
  // Fire the "slideenter" event (handled by htmlwidgets.js) when the current
  // slide changes (different for each slide format).
  (function () {
    // dispatch for htmlwidgets
    function fireSlideEnter() {
      const event = window.document.createEvent("Event");
      event.initEvent("slideenter", true, true);
      window.document.dispatchEvent(event);
    }

    function fireSlideChanged(previousSlide, currentSlide) {
      fireSlideEnter();

      // dispatch for shiny
      if (window.jQuery) {
        if (previousSlide) {
          window.jQuery(previousSlide).trigger("hidden");
        }
        if (currentSlide) {
          window.jQuery(currentSlide).trigger("shown");
        }
      }
    }

    // hookup for slidy
    if (window.w3c_slidy) {
      window.w3c_slidy.add_observer(function (slide_num) {
        // slide_num starts at position 1
        fireSlideChanged(null, w3c_slidy.slides[slide_num - 1]);
      });
    }

  })();
</script>
